avalancheActivity.comment:
The snowpack will be well bonded.
The surface of the snowpack has frozen to form a strong crust and will soften during the day.
Individual avalanche prone locations are to be found especially on very steep shady slopes in high Alpine regions.
In particular in the Prealps from a snow sport perspective, in most cases insufficient snow is lying.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Outgoing longwave radiation during the night will be good. There is a danger of falling on the hard snow surface.

snowpackStructure.comment: In the Prealps as well as at low altitude no snow is lying. Also in neighbouring regions less snow than usual is lying.

avalancheActivity.comment:
A clear night will be followed in the early morning by quite favourable avalanche conditions. The surface of the snowpack has frozen to form a strong crust.
There is a danger of falling on the hard snow surface.
Avalanches can be released in the old snowpack in particular in extremely steep terrain. This applies in particular in case of a large load. The avalanche prone locations are rather rare.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The conditions are mostly favourable for backcountry touring. Individual avalanche prone locations are to be found in particular on very steep shady slopes.

snowpackStructure.comment:
In particular adjacent to ridgelines snow depths vary greatly, depending on the infuence of the wind.
Individual weak layers exist in the top section of the snowpack on shady slopes.
Low and intermediate altitudes and sunny slopes: The conditions are spring-like. The surface of the snowpack has frozen to form a strong crust will soften during the day.
In all regions as well as in all altitude zones less snow than usual is lying.
